channel.title: orgflow on David John Baker
channel.description: Recent content in orgflow on David John Baker

item.title: Orgflow 6: Notes on Minutes and Communications
item.description: Being good at organization is a blessing and a curse. It’s a blessing as it allows you to feel more in control of what is coming on the horizon.

item.title: Orgflow: 0. Saying No
item.description: As foreshadowed in the introductory post in this series, the orgflow system is not meant to make you more productive.

item.title: Orgflow: How I Work
item.description: We have introduced a new monthly standing meeting at the Music Cognition Group where the focus is meant to be on how to work.
